languages.text: {n}Эвейн упрямо наклоняет голову.{/n} "Он мой друг. И вассал моего отца. Я не отрицаю его вину — но хочу дать шанс искупить ее".
{n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."
languages.original_text: {n}Эвейн упрямо наклоняет голову.{/n} "Он мой друг. И вассал моего отца. Я не отрицаю его вину — но хочу дать шанс искупить ее".

languages.text: {n}Baja obstinadamente la cabeza.{/n} «Es mi amigo, y vasallo de mi padre. No niego su culpabilidad, pero pretendo darle la oportunidad de enmendarla».
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Baja obstinadamente la cabeza.{/n} «Es mi amigo, y vasallo de mi padre. No niego su culpabilidad, pero pretendo darle la oportunidad de enmendarla».

languages.text: {n}Er senkt stur den Kopf.{/n} "Er ist mein Freund. Und der Vasall meines Vaters. Ich leugne seine Schuld nicht — doch ich werde ihm die Gelegenheit geben, dafür zu büßen."
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er senkt stur den Kopf.{/n} "Er ist mein Freund. Und der Vasall meines Vaters. Ich leugne seine Schuld nicht — doch ich werde ihm die Gelegenheit geben, dafür zu büßen."

languages.text: {n}Il baisse la tête avec obstination.{/n} « C'est mon ami. Et un vassal de mon père. Je ne nie pas sa culpabilité... Mais je compte bien lui laisser une chance de se racheter. »
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il baisse la tête avec obstination.{/n} « C'est mon ami. Et un vassal de mon père. Je ne nie pas sa culpabilité... Mais je compte bien lui laisser une chance de se racheter. »

languages.text: {n}他固执地低下头。{/n}“他是我的朋友，也是我父亲的臣民。我并不是说他没有犯罪，我只是想给他个赎罪的机会。”
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}他固执地低下头。{/n}“他是我的朋友，也是我父亲的臣民。我并不是说他没有犯罪，我只是想给他个赎罪的机会。”

languages.text: {n}彼は深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「彼は俺の友人、そして父の家臣だ。彼の罪を否定はしない…が、その罪を償うチャンスを与えたいのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はしっかりと頭を下げる。{/n}「彼は俺の友人であり、父の家臣だ。彼が罪を起こしたことは認める…だけど、その罪を償うチャンスを与えたいんだ」
{n}彼は深々と頭を下げる。{/n}「彼は俺の友人、そして父の家臣だ。彼の罪を否定はしない…が、その罪を償うチャンスを与えたいのだ」

languages.text: {n}Başını inatla eğiyor.{/n} "O benim arkadaşım. Ayrıca babamın tebaasından. Suçunu inkâr etmiyorum ama telafi etmesi için ona şans vermek niyetindeyim."
languages.original_text: {n}He lowers his head stubbornly.{/n} "He is my friend. And my father's vassal. I do not deny his guilt — but I intend to give him the chance to atone for it."
